entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -21.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 5:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -21.2°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -27.6°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
